text: The National Regeneration Movement (, MORENA) is a left-wing political party in Mexico. It was formally registered as a political party in 2014, it was led by three-time presidential candidate Andrés Manuel López Obrador until 12 December 2017, when he registered himself as a candidate for the party's nomination, and was succeeded by Yeidckol Polevnsky Gurwitz. ==References== Category:Political parties in Mexico
title: Morena (political party)
